lexUnit.definition: COD: a union or association formed for mutual benefit

sentence.text: Such opposition from his former Anglican and Tory allies persuaded James to try to forge an alliance with the Dissenters , in the hope that the disabilities under which they suffered would give them common cause with the Catholics to support the removal of the penal laws .
